notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by JSPS KAKENHI Grant Numbers JP16H05174, JP17H04661 and JP15K15126, and from the Japan Society for the Promotion of Science, Health and Labor Sciences Research Grant on Emerging and Re-emerging Infectious Diseases (AMED, 19fk0108035h1203) from the Japanese Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare, Research on International Cooperation in Medical Science (Japan-US Cooperative Program), Health and Labor Sciences Research Grants, the Cooperative Research Grant(s) of NEKKEN, 2014, and the Japan Initiative for Global Research Network on Infectious Diseases (J-GRID, 19fm0108001). This work was conducted at the Joint Usage/Research Center on Tropical Medicine, Nagasaki University.
